submission.balance: ~$1,062 (the approximate amount of value at the time of the exploit)
submission.messageText:
1. 0x02E06b9BFF33B42FceC5992430b732037716cF9e

2. 2YcB3QQGWho5oogDd1nK3cpLQzwwwXGxybrhe2xDkDxq

3. https://solscan.io/tx/3uWBgeqEb6R87LKbxePvwXXtjFpyukn4NDSA6tjcoKQ6Wg8prDv13sHsmxGpKugfHX7PJqq7inCHG5qeVHZ2wFxa

4. 2 transactions of providing liquidity: 
1st: https://solscan.io/tx/3wkBgXvPoNJ7zRGoxDzrypnAtC4YTXchxfzjGLgE7VsfNNcn9yHAZNKjxdAXmqdhSZaq9743BBmMXn9dqWGnCQWD
2nd: https://solscan.io/tx/57SKAXCU4evQVFFeEyicsG16RowJVBFQrYSHFGYp3zNKJrvvsuSapAViYH6MRFCiQXyvt5p6uHnhfhQoemMULs2Q

5. ~$1,062 (the approximate amount of value at the time of the exploit)

6. The source of money: My 6-month saving at the start-up crypto company I'm currently working at (the salary of Vietnam crypto companies are extremely low).

As rewarded with volatile assets, I was hoping to leverage my capital (salary) which is pretty low (compared to average crypto users) by using my C98 and providing liquidity for C98/CASH.

With this exploit going on, I had almost nothing left, except some few C98 that I borrowed from my colleague after the hack. I borrowed it to find some other exposure with C98 on Solana in an attempt to outperform my loss. However, as I found no other alternatives, I decided to return the funds, and sitting with literally $0 in my account.

Life has been incredibly difficult and stressful for me as a 20 year old university sophomore. I'm trying to "skin in the game" and get exposure to DeFi, and has already got rekt after 3 months with 3 exploits (Cashio, Grim Finance, Tinyman).

I hope nothing but the return of my worthwhile funds. Sincere thanks to anyone to do this, should it happen.
submission.source:
The source of money: My 6-month saving at the start-up crypto company I'm currently working at (the salary of Vietnam crypto companies are extremely low).

As rewarded with volatile assets, I was hoping to leverage my capital (salary) which is pretty low (compared to average crypto users) by using my C98 and providing liquidity for C98/CASH.

With this exploit going on, I had almost nothing left, except some few C98 that I borrowed from my colleague after the hack. I borrowed it to find some other exposure with C98 on Solana in an attempt to outperform my loss. However, as I found no other alternatives, I decided to return the funds, and sitting with literally $0 in my account.

Life has been incredibly difficult and stressful for me as a 20 year old university sophomore. I'm trying to "skin in the game" and get exposure to DeFi, and has already got rekt after 3 months with 3 exploits (Cashio, Grim Finance, Tinyman).

I hope nothing but the return of my worthwhile funds. Sincere thanks to anyone to do this, should it happen.
